title: FLASHBACK: These Rare Pics Of Shahrukh Khan From The Sets Of Fauji Will Transport You Back In Time!
text:
Features Â» FLASHBACK: These Rare Pics Of Shahrukh Khan From The Sets Of Fauji Will Transport You Back In Time! FLASHBACK: These Rare Pics Of Shahrukh Khan From The Sets Of Fauji Will Transport You Back In Time! We recently came across a few pictures of SRK from the sets of 'Fauji' and boy, it made us walk down the memory lane. Published: Tuesday, February 21, 2017, 9:14   
Shahrukh Khan is the 'Baadshah' of Bollywood today. But the superstar have had a humble beginning and has struggled his way to the top to achieve this stardom. 
Before becoming the 'King Of Romance', the actor did a stint on televsion with shows like Fauji, Circus and few others before bagging his first feature film. Fauji is one of his most popular shows that has a high recall value even today. 
ALSO READ: BLAST FROM THE PAST: When Divya Bharti CRIED Because Of Aamir Khan & Salman Came To Her Rescue! 
Incidentally, SRK was never the first choice to play Lieutenant Abhimanyu Rai in the show. It was instead to be played by producer-writer-director Colonel RK Kapoor's son. In a Deccan Chronicle report, Shahrukh had said, "A lot of what I am today is courtesy luck. The colonel's son, who was the cinematographer, was also to play the lead. But he realised he can't do both simultaneously and decided to stick to cinematography. The colonel couldn't find a replacement in time, so he said, 'Hey, you. You are the one. You are good, jolly good. Come on. Go there.'. And I became Abhimanyu Rai, overnight. And he was the nicest to me. All of them treated me like family." 
We recently came across a few pictures of SRK from the sets of Fauji and boy, it will leave you quite stunned. Have a look here- 
Vanity Fair 
Even back then, SRK was quite particular about his looks and enjoyed being the centre of female attention! *winks* Hunger Pangs Can Strike You Anytime & Anywhere 
Nothing is more tempting than a plate of piping hot food! At that moment, you don't care a sh*t about being clicked. Even SRK would agree to that! Mere Naal Tu Whistle Bajaa 
This Tiger Shroff- Kriti Sanon song perfectly sums this up. LOL Why So Smiling, SRK? 
The superstar is seen here with his group of co-stars. But our eyes are just fixed on his heart-melting smile! SRK Goes Attention Please! 
SRK is seen here engaging in some pensive conversation. We wonder what's the matter! Time To Work 
He is seen here rehearsing a scene with his co-star. Captured On Lens 
Some more conversation time for SRK. But this time, the scene shifts to a garden! 
(Picture Courtesy- Twitter)
